 Well this'll go over like a fart church, I thought this was private e-mai=
l.  Ghost research, and ITC research seem to be two different things or fie=
lds, and maybe they should kept seperate. 
 
 PS I'll delete that off the g=
roup when I get home. And I'll be careful to keep my comments to myself. 

=

To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comFrom: franks-boxes@...: Fri, 9 Nov =
2007 13:49:47 -0700Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: You tube?




 I think I'll s=
tart making a distinction between the typical paranormal investigator moron=
, and ITC. The paranormal twits seem to have no concept of what spirit acut=
ally is, and how it's possible to communicate. I'm tired to arguing with th=
e idiots. I can't get past their huge egos to make teh point that it's not =
white noise, and spirits can travel. I just had another go round with one o=
f Rosemary Guiley's friends, her tech, these people just can't hear what I'=
m trying to say. 
   Frank  

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: urkel23@aol.=
comDate: Fri, 9 Nov 2007 20:09:23 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: You tube?


P=
aranormal Experts??? Is there such a thing, are we talking about the field =
that has ideas and theories and no solid evidence of anything to back it up=
? It's like being an expert at something that you can't prove exists in the=
 first place. We would have a better shot of being an expert at picking the=
 winning lottery numbers than proving to someone that an afterlife exists.-=
Steve H.--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> w=
rote:>> > Yeah, he's got the grumpy attitude! I just wanted to get some aud=
io and video out here so the average person could hear what it's supposed t=
o sound like unfiltered by some paranormal expert. Unfrotunate that it'll p=
robably create some demand. > > Frank> > > To: EVP-ITC@...: urkel23@...: Fr=

 see it now ---- E-True hollywood story: Frank Sumption. I'd know i'd watch=
, maybe they can get russell crowe to play you in it.-Steve H.--- In EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@> wrote:>> > I get grumpy, =
and pissed. I try to share to information about the box, and it's the same =
friggin' arguement everytime. I'm just now answering e-mails generated from=
 the mistake of leaving a comment on a site about how I think most of what =
passes for paranormal knowledge is Hollywood. I can't get past that shit, n=
or can I get past the egos, so I give up, they can't hear me. > > I think t=
he problem is intellect, it takes a certain level to be able to comprehend,=
 and use the boxes, to everyone else its' going to look fake, and sound lik=
e gibberish. > > > Frank-S> > > > > To: EVP-ITC@: lisby@: Thu, 8 Nov 2007 2=

rch on Ghost Box, Frank's box, ITC, EVP, or paranormal, or maybe "PurpleAli=
enGirl" (user name). It's my first attempt, so I'm not sure if it worked, a=
nd it's blocked here at work. BTW, I'm not sure if the Purple Princess stuf=
f puts people off, that's who my guys say I am, and I accept that as an axi=
om. As if it matters, but that's an "other level" identity, and has little =
to do with physical conditions. Purple is a treacher, that's all, I just ha=
